sources.title: This Can't Be Love
sources.description:
Based on the works of M. Zoshchenko "Crime and Punishment", "A Funny Adventure", "A Wedding Incident". The musical satirical comedy ridicules human passions: an insatiable thirst for profit, moral depravity, drunkenness, spiritual poverty. The film consists of three short stories.

IMDb: 7,7

Year of production: 1975

Director: Leonid Gaidai
Scriptwriter: Leonid Gaidai, Vladlen Bakhnov
Composer: Alexander Zatsepin
Cameraman: Sergey Poluyanov
Production designer: Evgeniy Kumankov

Cast: Georgy Vitsin, Mikhail Pugovkin, Nina Grebeshkova, Oleg Dal, Leonid Kuravlev, Vyacheslav Nevinny, Natalya Selezneva, Saveliy Kramarov, Evgeny Zharikov, Svetlana Kryuchkova, Svetlana Kharitonova, Lyudmila Shagalova, Sergey Filippov, Valentina Telichkina, Mikhail Kokshenov, Mikhail Svetin, Larisa Eremina

metadata.Plot: Two former movie stars, Marian Bennett and Michael Reyman had a brief and bitter marriage during their careers in the 40's. Many years later they are reunited and things haven't got any better between the two...
metadata.Actors: Katharine Hepburn, Anthony Quinn, Jason Bateman
